thread.title: Video: I am not dead, says man mistaken for doctor who jumped off bridge
thread.title_full: Video: I am not dead, says man mistaken for doctor who jumped off bridge

author: Okogba
title: Video: I am not dead, says man mistaken for doctor who jumped off bridge
text:
Breaking News Translate Home » Videos » Video: I am not dead, says man mistaken for doctor who jumped off bridge Video: I am not dead, says man mistaken for doctor who jumped off bridge On 11:47 am In Videos by Okogba Comments 
On Sunday 19 March, a doctor named Allwell Orji was reported to have jumped off the Third Mainland bridge into the Lagoon with search till ongoing to bring him out dead or alive. 
Yesterday, a picture of a young male nurse who co-incidentally bears same name as the doctor circulated online as the ‘jumping’ doctor. It is now clear that it was a case of mistaken identity. 
The young nurse has now spoken out saying he was not even in Lagos at the time of the sad event 
Watch full video below…
